info.title: REST API
info.description: This project is a REST API built with Express.js, providing endpoints for user authentication, publication management, comment management, friend management, and admin functionalities. It is a simplified version of BeReal, a social media platform for sharing real-life experiences.

get.description: Get the statistics of a user

For any user this will return, by default, the feed of publication (all the publications made by the user's friends after the last notification time). For an admin this will return all the publications
